resources.string: Hackathons are proving grounds for new ideas. They’re especially good tools to stimulate the creative and problem-solving juices of developers.

Associating your brand with a hackathon can change the public’s perception of your brand.
Help acquire developer mind share.
It is an efficient way to deliver more awareness about your company to a prime, target audience –the maker community and increase brand exposure in the tech world.

Planning to host your hackathon?
Press the button below.
BON VOYAGE !!
